Class MeteredLot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParkingLot
      • MeteredLot

  • public class MeteredLot
extends ParkingLot
    Class for creating metered Lots

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeteredLot

        public MeteredLot(java.lang.String lotName,
          int lotNumber,
          java.lang.String lotLocation,
          int totalSpaces,
          int reservedSpaces,
          double meterRate)
        Constructor: Creates a Metered Lot object holding all the description of a metered parking lot
        Parameters:
        lotName - is the lot name
        lotNumber - is the lot number
        lotLocation - is the lot location
        totalSpaces - is the total meters in the parking lot
        reservedSpaces - is the total reserved meters in the parking lot(is always 0 for metered lots)
        meterRate - is the meter parking rate per hour

    • Method Detail

      • checkMeter

        public boolean checkMeter(int lotNo,
                 int meterNo,
                 Time enterTime,
                 Time exitTime)
        Implements the CheckMeter method in superclass ParkingLot
        Parameters:
        lotNo - is the parking lot number
        meterNo - is the metered number parked at
        enterTime - is the parking enter time
        exitTime - is the parking exit time
        Returns:
        true if meter occupied, false if meter free
